scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd react && npm install" "cd electron && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd react && npm start" "cd electron && npm start"
scripts.win:build:react: cd react && npm run-script build && move build ../electron/build
scripts.win:build:win: npm run-script build:prepare && cd electron && move index.js index.dev.js && move index.prod.js index.js && electron-builder && move index.js index.prod.js && move index.dev.js index.js && rmdir /s /q build
scripts.mac:build:electron: rm -rf .tmp-app && mkdir .tmp-app && rsync -av --progress electron/ .tmp-app --exclude node_modules && cd .tmp-app && npm install --only=production && rm dev.html && rm package.json.lock && rm -f .DS_STORE && mv -f index.prod.js index.js
scripts.mac:build:react: rm -rf .tmp-react-build && mkdir .tmp-react-build && rsync -av --progress react/ .tmp-react-build --exclude node_modules && cd .tmp-react-build && npm install --only=production && npm build && cp -r build ../.tmp-app
scripts.mac:build:prepare: concurrently "npm run-script build:electron" "npm run-script build:react" && cd .tmp-app && find . -name ".DS_Store" -delete
